headline: Here Are Friday’s Top Wall Street Analyst Research Calls: ConocoPhillips, Devon Energy, Garmin, Honeywell, HP, PepsiCo, Rocket Labs, Seagate, and More
summary: Pre-Market Stock Futures: The futures are trading higher as we get set to close out the week on a possible winning note, after a massive bounce-back rally on Thursday that saw all the major indices surge higher. summary: The merger, if executed, could create one of the largest independent shale producers in the US.
